content.html: You don't hate Mondays. You hate Capitalism. You don't hate crowded spaces, you hate bringing cars into people space. You don't hate cities, you hate pollution, noise from cars and having limited space to escape the rural monsters.
content.value:
You don't hate Mondays. You hate Capitalism. 

You don't hate crowded spaces, you hate bringing cars into people space.

You don't hate cities, you hate pollution, noise from cars and having limited space to escape the rural monsters.
